name: Recipe: Apple Roly Poly
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Apple Roly Poly.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Dish Effects</color>
After you activate a Petrified Tree, a Ley Line Outcrop, or open a Treasure Chest, restore <color=#37ffff>16%–20%</color> HP and an extra <color=#37ffff>600–1,200</color> HP to all party members. This effect can occur once every 5s. Lasts 900s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
<color=#ffffff>Proficiency</color>
15
<color=#ffffff>Dishes</color>

customize.name: Apple Roly Poly
customize.desc: A traditional apple dessert. The mere aroma of the apples gives a feeling akin to situating oneself before a warm hearth. Before you can even think to slowly appreciate it, your hands move as if compelled by some other person, knife and fork in tow, reaching out for the next piece.

customize.name: Delicious Apple Roly Poly
customize.desc: A traditional apple dessert. The mere aroma of the apples gives a feeling akin to situating oneself before a warm hearth. Before you can even think to slowly appreciate it, your hands move as if compelled by some other person, knife and fork in tow, reaching out for the next piece.

customize.name: Suspicious Apple Roly Poly
customize.desc: A traditional apple dessert. Apples are apples, and dough is dough. To force them into a commonality they do not share is to create an awkward mess that even the most flavorful butter cannot rescue.

customize.name: Sara
customize.desc: The waitress of Good Hunter. She sells various food dishes, cooking ingredients, and recipes.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Apple Roly Poly
customize.desc: A traditional apple dessert. The mere aroma of the apples gives a feeling akin to situating oneself before a warm hearth. Before you can even think to slowly appreciate it, your hands move as if compelled by some other person, knife and fork in tow, reaching out for the next piece.

customize.name: Apple
customize.desc: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Butter
customize.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.
